person.persName: Charles Alfred Hardin (Mercer County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, attorney. Columbia, Kentucky, native. Son of Parker Hardin and Caroline Hardin. Married to Jennie Magoffin Hardin on May 3, 1859. Father of Ebenezer Hardin, Parker E. Hardin, and Charles A. Hardin. Graduate of Centre College in Danville, Kentucky, in 1856. Attorney in Georgetown, Missouri, in 1860. Resident of Mercer County in 1863.
